document.full_text: alex ovechkin and matt hendricks scored third period goals as the washington capitals fought back to snatch a 2-1 victory over the carolina hurricanes on friday, extending their winning streak to seven games.
document.title: caps rally to take the wind out of the hurricanes
lines_and_colors: alex ovechkin and matt hendricks scored third period goals as the washington capitals fought back to snatch a 2-1 victory over the carolina hurricanes on friday, extending their winning streak to seven games.
